Subjects: hymns, to God; Trinity, God in
_description: James Ryman, a macaronic hymn to God in Trinity — five quatrains (abab) including refrain, ‘Te deum laudamus’, and burden: ‘Dulciter pangamus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O fader of eternall blysQui semper es
                    ingenitus…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Bothe iij and j of myghtis mostTe deum
                    laudamus

Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 299-300.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.

            1977: 203-4; 1977, 180.
